plot: When it's your birthday, the least you expect is a "Happy Birthday". A missed phone call leads our hero to the therapist's couch, where he starts testifying his own "suspicious" reality. ...
title: Chronia polla
plot_es: When it's your birthday, the least you expect is a "Happy Birthday". A missed phone call leads our hero to the therapist's couch, where he starts testifying his own "suspicious" reality. ...
